channel.title: Can you teach me how
channel.description:
hi i have been coding for almost 2 weeks and im picking it up okay...
i was wondering if some1 could please show me how i add npcs...make them sell new items and set up prices
and also how i edit npc looks
i.e a man so i can learn and then make my own npcs
add me on msn sk8_rikki@hotmail.com
thanks
